original_text: And the city lieth foursquare, and the length is as large as the breadth: and he measured the city with the reed, twelve thousand furlongs. The length and the breadth and the height of it are equal.
korean_text: 그 성은 네모가 반듯하여 길이와 너비가 같은지라 그 갈대 자로 그 성을 측량하니 만 이천 스다디온이요 길이와 너비와 높이가 같더라

sentences.original_text: and the length is as large as the breadth
and he measured the city with the reed
The length and the breadth and the height of it are equal
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 길이와 너비와 높이는 모두 같더라
